resources.string: "Â© 2019 Chatty Notes Lite. All rights reserved."
"A new version of Chatty Notes Lite is available. Please download the latest version."
"This version of Chatty Notes Lite is obsolete. Please download the latest version."
"Application version obsolete and not supported further"
"This version of Chatty Notes Lite is obsolete, all your data will be lost. Please download the latest version."
"To easily save notes, allow Chatty Notes Lite to access multiple permissions."

"To capture photos and videos, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your camera, your microphone and your device's photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera, Microphone and Storage on."
"To capture photos and videos, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your camera, your microphone and your device's photos, media, and files."
"To send media, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your device's photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Storage on."
"To send media, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your device's photos, media, and files."
To capture photos and videos, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your camera. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To capture photos and videos, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your camera.
"To record a Voice Message, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your microphone and your device's photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Microphone on and Storage on."
"To record a Voice Message, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your microphone and your device's photos, media, and files."
To send a nearby place or your location, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your location. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Location on.
To send a nearby place or your location, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your location.
"To update chat image, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your camera and your device's photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera and Storage on."
"To update chat image, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your camera and your device's photos, media, and files."
"To send an email, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your device's photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Storage on."
"To send an email, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your device's photos, media, and files."
"To view media, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your device's photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Storage on."
"To view media, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your device's photos, media, and files."
"To detect whether backup is present in your storage, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your device's photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Storage on."
"To detect whether backup is present in your storage, allow Chatty Notes Lite access to your device's photos, media, and files."
